answers.answer: If you've only tested once, test again, and if negative go see your doctor
I'm more concerned about your general health.  By all means, go to a doctor and see what's happening!

question: P'lease could someone advice me, because i am very confused. First, i must tell you i am over weight, my periods aren't regular, and i am a possible candidate for diabetes.For two months i havn't seen my period, took a urine pregnancy test but i came up negative. i have been weak off and on again, have pains on my feet, and my stomach feels swollen and tight.............. i have been to scared to test for diabetes, but i want to believe it could be pregnancy........... PLEASE HELP ME OUT !!!
title: I'm confused if this is diabetes or early symptoms of pregnancy ?!
